channel.title: Rojhat Sinan Balka
channel.description: Recent content on Rojhat Sinan Balka

item.description: Rojhat Sinan Balka | Software Engineer rojbalka@gmail.com | https://linkedin.com/in/roj | https://github.com/rosiba | Istanbul, Turkey Summary Self-taught software engineer with expertise in backend development of microservices and gRPC communication. Skills Languages: Programming: Golang, Python, Java, Javascript, Typescript Scripting: BASH, Fish Markup: HTML, CSS, Markdown Query: SQL, NoSQL, PL/SQL Spoken: English, Turkish Frameworks: Echo, go-gin, go-chi, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS Go: Echo, go-gin, go-chi Javascript: React, Next.js CSS: Tailwind CSS AI/ML: NumPy, Tensorflow, Langchain Database: SQL: PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite NoSQL: MongoDB, DynamoDB Cache: Redis Cloud: AWS, GCP DevOps: Containerization: Kubernetes, Docker CI/CD: Jenkins, Travis, Github Actions, ArgoCD IoC: Terraform Experience ERP Developer Medipol Health Group (2024-Present)
